mapper.select: select u.user_name, m.mail_title, m.mail_regdate, m.mail_no, u.user_no, u.user_email from mail m, users u where m.user_no = u.user_no
SELECT u.user_name, m.mail_title, m.mail_regdate, m.mail_content, m.mail_no, u.user_email from mail m, users u where m.user_no = u.user_no and mail_no = #{mail_no}
select user_name, user_email from mail_rcver mr, mail m, users u where mr.mail_no = m.mail_no and mr.user_no = u.user_no and m.mail_no = #{mail_no}
mapper.insert: insert into mail (mail_no, user_no, mail_title, mail_content) values(seq_mail.nextval, #{user_no}, #{mail_title}, #{mail_content})
